title.en: Kaguya-sama Wants to Make Him Cum

description.en:
All’s fair when sex is war!

Two geniuses. Two genitals. Two libidos. One battle. Who will cum first…?!

Kaguya Shinomiya and Miyuki Shirogane are two geniuses who stand atop their prestigious academy’s student council, making them the elite among elite, yadda yadda yadda, they fell in love, yadda yadda yadda, read the manga, anyway they are now a couple who must deal with their carnal urges.

Based on a manga that won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Awards in the general manga category.
